channel.title: Help with complieing
channel.description:
Hey, i have no-ip duc running ticked dannypk.no-ip.org
i have complier.bat and runserver.bat runnin ive edited them as normal
the complier code is: [code]@echo off title Compiler "%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause[/code]
and the runserver,bat code is:
@echo off title dannypk.no-ip.info set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause
Yeh^ all above are right.. i can get on the server with not adding an ip but the dannypk.no-ip.info doesnt work for others even for me and my ip doesnt work for others too here is the pic what it says when i compile:
[img]http://img263.imageshack.us/img263/6766/compileerrorpg0.png[/img]
and the runserver.bat
[img]http://img329.imageshack.us/img329/7687/runserverbatfr6.png[/img]
thats working as fine^
please help .

right the compilers working now but others cant join still only me??

item.title: Help with complieing
item.dc:creator: @urm0mp00nz urm0mp00nz
item.description:
@urm0mp00nz wrote:

Hey, i have no-ip duc running ticked dannypk.no-ip.org

i have complier.bat and runserver.bat runnin ive edited them as normal

the complier code is: @echo off title Compiler "%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

and the runserver,bat code is:

@echo off
title dannypk.no-ip.info
set java=“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe”
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause

Yeh^ all above are right… i can get on the server with not adding an ip but the dannypk.no-ip.info doesnt work for others even for me and my ip doesnt work for others too here is the pic what it says when i compile:

and the runserver.bat

thats working as fine^

please help .

Read full topic
